sense.gloss: votive tablet, wooden tablet usu. filled out with a prayer and one's name and hung up at a shrine or temple; orig. picturing a horse, as a stand-in for a donation of a live horse

sdata.j: カードで↑支払↑↓しはら↓|えま|すか。
sdata.e: Can I pay by credit card?
